name: Astro Pong Beta
description:
Astro Pong Beta is a simple pong-ish arcade game. Its a 2 player game with VERY fun gameplay. This game is still in beta so it will be getting some bug fixes every now and then.

[Controls]

Are in the game.

[Recent Updates]

-Ball now has a trail

-Fixed window size

-Minor bug fixes

Thank You! -BananaBros
